loveline.title: LoveLine - Relationship OS
loveline.tagline: Connecting partners through subtle technology. A private digital bridge for couples in the age of constant distraction.
loveline.description: Private digital space for couples featuring IoT interaction and integrated date planning.

sections.context: LoveLine is a specialized communication tool designed to bridge the gap between digital interaction and physical presence. It provides a private connection between homes, serving as a permanent link regardless of distance.
sections.problem: Standard messaging often feels impersonal. Long-distance partners lack the tactile atmosphere that dedicated hardware can provide. Existing tools focus on productivity rather than personal connection.
sections.solution: A real-time IoT ecosystem where SvelteKit meets ESP32. When a moment is sent, a physical frame in the partner's home responds instantly. Synchronous presence designed for focused, personal interaction.
sections.impact: Managed decision-making through an integrated date-engine. Successful bridging of distance with low-latency hardware, making physical separation feel more manageable.

robotics.title: CBRN Prewarning - Robotics
robotics.tagline: Reliable data where standard systems fail. Specialized CBRN detection with a 2km LoRa heartbeat.
robotics.description: Functional ABC/CBRN detection demonstrator and handheld monitoring system for technical safety evaluation.

sections.context: Commissioned for the Austrian Armed Forces, this project serves as a technical demonstrator. The goal was to build a mobile CBRN detection unit using cost-effective, off-the-shelf components to provide a digital early-warning lifeline.
sections.problem: Hazardous environments require rapid deployment, but professional grade hardware is often expensive or proprietary. A solution was needed that combined reliability with accessible hardware components.
sections.solution: An ESP32-based ecosystem utilizing LoRa for a 2km heartbeat. By integrating standard sensors and modular electronics, the robot detects Radiation, O2, and CO in real-time, streaming high-integrity data to a terminal.
sections.impact: A functional production-ready prototype demonstrating 100% telemetry reliability. Proven that specialized safety tools can be built effectively on modern microcontrollers.

grading-bot.title: Grading Bot - EdTech Automation
grading-bot.tagline: Optimizing evaluation, streamlining feedback. High-performance engine for automated code assessment.
grading-bot.description: Professional-grade automated system for evaluating student coding assignments, used at HTL Hollabrunn.

sections.context: Grading Bot is a flagship diploma project, designed to handle the practical requirements of 1000+ student submissions. It is the automated engine powering code evaluation at HTL Hollabrunn, making the process significantly more efficient.
sections.problem: Manual code reviews were slow and could be inconsistent. A faster, fairer, and strictly sandboxed system was required to handle high volumes of submissions effectively.
sections.solution: High-performance evaluation system using Docker for secure, isolated execution. Integration with Azure AD and MS Teams creates a seamless workflow that evaluates student code in seconds.
sections.impact: More than 1,000 assignments successfully evaluated. Reliable security and significant time savings for instructors. Students receive immediate feedback during their workflow.

unleashed.title: Unleashed - Privacy-First Social Media
unleashed.tagline: Privacy by design. A digital platform for connection without data compromises.
unleashed.description: Social network concept focused on user privacy and direct interaction.

sections.context: Unleashed is a proof of concept for privacy-focused social media. A mobile-first platform built to demonstrate that human connection can be achieved without typical tracking mechanisms.
sections.problem: Modern social media often compromises user data for monetization. Privacy is frequently secondary to advertising interests and complex algorithms.
sections.solution: Privacy-centered architecture where user control is the default. No tracking or manipulative algorithmsâ€”just direct, user-focused interaction built on a foundation of reliability.
sections.impact: A functional model for ethical social media. High levels of engagement maintained while prioritizing data privacy and user control.

genesys.title: Genesys Cloud Systems
genesys.tagline: Orchestrating global conversations. High-availability CX engineering for the enterprise.
genesys.description: Enterprise-grade customer experience solutions for global brands.

sections.context: Consulting at the intersection of psychology and scale. Managing complex communication architecture that powers customer experience for global household names.
sections.problem: Massive contact centers are often fragmented by legacy tools. Latency hinders empathy, and disconnected channels frustrate both agents and customers.
sections.solution: Sub-second interaction flows architected via Genesys Cloud's API-first platform. Custom routing logic and unified agent tools transformed fragmented noise into a harmonious omnichannel experience.
sections.impact: 25% boost in agent efficiency. Seamless communication for millions. Proof that every interaction can feel personal even at massive enterprise scale.

portfolio.title: Bigls Portfolio - 3D Experience
portfolio.tagline: Technical excellence and performance. High-performance 3D experiment in modern web engineering.
portfolio.description: Interactive 3D portfolio exploring modern web technologies.

sections.context: A project demonstrating that 3D graphics, animations, and SEO performance can be effectively integrated into a single package.
sections.problem: 3D on the web can often be slow or difficult for search engines to index. Cinematic portfolios frequently compromise on mobile performance or accessibility.
sections.solution: Optimized custom shaders, SvelteKit for server-side state, and GSAP for coordinated interaction. A 60FPS experience that remains accessible to search engine crawlers.
sections.impact: High performance scores across all metrics. Zero technical compromises on the core experience. A demonstration of how modern web tech can be both immersive and discoverable.
